storyInfo: A Spokesman surfaces and begins quietly making moves in the knight competition. Zofia finalizes her strategy with Maria: to participate in a grand melee.

attributes.content: 3:49 PM \ Clear \ Kazimierz Kawalerielki Alliance, a private open-air loft
...I see you’ve arrived, Mr. Mob.
Wait. It’s you. I saw you back at the arena and you said—
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: No. That’s neither here nor there. Now, don’t be so wound up. Take a seat.
Allow me to introduce myself again—please, call me Czarny. I’m one of the rotational managers, currently responsible for a division of the Knights Association.
I’m also an executive of the Mieszko Group Major & Publicity Department, and have had the great fortune to be selected as Divisional Spokesman to the General Chamber of Commerce.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Th—The GCC? Pardon me for my incredible rudeness earlier, Mr. Czarny...
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Forego the formality. I’m no critic of your... vernacular, 'Greatmouth Mob.' Or, perhaps, I should be calling you by your real name?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: N-No need...
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Haha, I only jest... Now, why don’t we take a look outside. Glorious view, isn’t it?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: There are some old types that hate this reinforced concrete jungle, the city of seamless day and night. But if you ask me, it is what symbolizes our strides towards civilization.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Our vast forests, grassland expanses, are a priceless part of Kazimierz, true, but our hardy Kazimierz hands built up great skyscrapers where the forests parted. It’s something we ought to be proud of.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: It is the only way we find shelter when a Catastrophe strikes, the only way form a front that can stand firm against our foreign enemies. Kazimierz is now prosperous, a rapidly developing place...
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Would you agree? Mr. Mob?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Course! You’re right on the mark!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: But Kazimierz’s strides are far from over. The road we have to walk is still long.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: For example... Mr. Mob, take your hometown, our 'City of Saplings and Artisans,' Ognisko.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: In the thousand miles around it, how many deprived villages lie? How many troubled lands unafforded the protection of a city?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Y-You really know your stuff, for sure. I was outta there, like, twenty-plus years ago.  Can I, uh, ask why you’re telling me all this, though?  Truth is, you’re kinda bugging me out here...
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Your frankness is another part of what draws me to you. I’ve come to make you an offer, Mr. Mob. One that will take us in joint strides. You’ve been poached.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: ...Me? But I just took a down from the Roar Guards Company...
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Please, relax. This contract is confidential, sealed by none other than Mr. Pavel himself. Now, from today on, your employer will be...
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: S-So I’m a Mieszko guy now?
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: You could put it that way... but let me nitpick it very slightly.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Yeah?
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: From now on, you’re MY guy, Mr. Anchorman.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Hiyaaaaaah—!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...Let’s stop here for today.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Huh? But I can still...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Overdoing it will undo you! You only just finished recovering. We’re all sturdy Kuranta, but no-one torments her body like do!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Alright...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: —Could you help me brainstorm about those Arts I mentioned, then, auntie?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...Didn’t we already go over this yesterday?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I watched this tape of Leithanien Knights battling last night, and I think I could pull from some parts of it to—
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Last night?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Ah...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: So you were up late again! I’ve said before, you need to get your rest!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Looks like someone’s back in good shape. Them two old cranks can rest easy now.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Oh! Marcin? Is something up?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Something? Eh... yeah, you might call this something.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: This is, um?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Sponsors who came knocking at your door. Thirteen, in all. And there’s some pretty high ranked corps looking for you...
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Whoaahh. Glorious Shield’s the weapons manufacturer, right... so even companies like these are into keeping competition knights?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Oh, they’re all Knightclub invitations. They put the numbers there to make you gasp. They’re looking to make you a fine puppet, that’s all.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Maria! You wouldn’t let these capitalists lead you by the nose, would you?! Remember your sister here can outbid these and then some, anyway!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Wait... I’m not falling for anything! Just, auntie, you spending money on me like that makes me feel kind of bad...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Money, my high-heeled foot. If I want to spend it, I’ll spend it. I didn’t buy this land by agonizing about it, I’ll have you know.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: (Is that why the 'gardens' here are just 'fields' now...)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Hah hah hah... fair to you, I know you turned every last one of them down. Made a fine family out of nothing but your prize money and a few years of retirement. Hats off.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: That said, I’m only here to hand these papers over. Saves Młynar the hassle. Rest of it’s up to you two alone. Think it over and if you’re okay, come relax over at the bar sometime.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Well... what do you say? Maria?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I’ve said before, but I don’t want our family crest to become a corporate logo... and I know I can’t stand toe-to-toe with the rest of them, either. Not as I am right now.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...You’re going to press on?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Mm-hm. This isn’t just about the money.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: When I think of 'Nearl,' the name my grandpa and my parents protected all their lives, I can’t imagine it was all just for the numbers and lines of the stock exchange.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: So...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Maria... Alright, it sounds like I’ll be throwing all of these away, then.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: If we’re going to make the cut for the Major, we need to get a lot more points, fast—that’s the biggest hurdle we face, as independent knights without a Knightclub to hide in.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Remember Szewczyk? Poor man, taken for a ride by his own sponsor. And yet he built up the points to rival nearly an entire team, just on sprint races, and duels alone.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Meanwhile, you had the Knightclubs all wrangling the rules for point transfers, arranging it so their trump cards didn’t even need to fight the preselections...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: So I’ll have to get past all of those Knightclub teams, soon enough...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: That’s right. That’s why we’re going to have to take some special measures... if we’re not wasting a single qualifier, we only have so many options.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Such as—
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Welcommme, one and allllll, to the Fireblade Arena—!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Fifteen teams! Fifteen knights!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Today’s match is a one-and-done! We’ll see plundering! Crazy battles! Tight escapes and desperate chases! Welcome to the third largest arena in Kazimierz, manmade to unleash the deathmatch within every knight!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: What’s that? You say one match only earns you one point!? Where does THAT happen!?
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Not here, not now! In this match, any valid attack against a fellow knight means a valid score, and that means points! Points, for fat stacks of cash!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: But who cares if a bunch of point-grabbers play a game!? No, I know! I know what it is you all really wanna see—
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: You wanna watch the heroes fall! You wanna watch the great stars crash to the ground! Thaaaat’s right! This season’s melee matches have a new rule in the mix, the 'Points Off' clause! You hear that, knights? Risk and reward in one!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Where’s the spice when your points never drop?! In this match, we’re following the 'Predator System!' Let’s keep it simple, sister: when someone goes up one, someone else is goin’ down one!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Oh, yeah! Believe it, I’m scrapping to see what the do-it-alls do! Our rising stars, swallowed up! It’s unprecedented, folks! A match to flip the rankings head to toe!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Thought you could qualify for the Major by wining it up in a bubble bath?! You’d better risk it all right here, right now! Get ready to rumble, because the world’s watching!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Don’t forget, our sponsored drones from Raythean Industries will be broadcasting every knight’s viewpoint non-stop! Our eight registered Knights Association referees won’t miss a single detail!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Now, the knights are making their final checks, the crew are fitting their armor with the sensory chips! How many stars will be born today, and how many are gonna eat dirt and taste crushing defeat?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: We can only wait—for the knights—to enterrrrrr—!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: What the hell? This guy again? Isn’t he supposed to keep to Roar Guards territory?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Guess he found his own rising star, now.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Nah... 'Points Off?' They ever have a 'Points Off' in the melees before?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: And they announced this all-new system right before the match started. What, they can just do that?!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Didn’t bet on the Association being all this capricious, did we... and it doesn’t bode well.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Looks like all fifteen knights are readied at their places! Once the crew are out of the way, the match will officially begin!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: A full sixty minutes of battle! Unless every knight is down for the count, this battle goes to the very last second!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Even if your points for this season take a sub-zero dive, you’ll still be in the game! Wanna see backs against walls? Last-gasp attacks? You’re in the right place, folks!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Hey, Maria Nearl.
—Who’re you?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Mmm... just one of your fans.
Alright—! All fifteen knights are signalling ready!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Let’s make it quick. The moment the Brassrust Knight healed up, Ashley—my Ashley—sent him straight back to the hospital. Man, the Ingras have been down on their luck for weeks now.
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: I declare—
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Now, Ashley took me right to the playoffs, so I’ve been a little panicked. Thought I’d try and make up a few points here. But I didn’t think I’d find you too, young Nearl.
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: —Why don’t we go for a little tête-à-tête?
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: A what?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: —Let the Fireblade Melee—begiiiiiiiiinnnnn—!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob
